subject: Re: Another plane prediction?
author: draiga1
full_text:
That's possible. And what if someone had set off a bomb in the upper atmosphere causing this problem? That's one of the theories floating around out there on the web. Between the birds, the fish, and the crabs, I don't know what to think of it all, but your message could have been about that.

~Draiga

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
> What if it's a metaphor for the birds dropping out of the air?
> http://www.comcast.net/video/2nd-state-experiences-mass-bird-kill/1721461553/Comcast/1722245809/
> F-s
>
